title: PUMPKIN BEER BREAD
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease a 9x5-inch bread pan with cooking spray, or line with
Stir flour, baking powder, salt, pumpkin pie spice, honey and pumpkin puree together in a large
mixing bowl until combined. Slowly add in the beer, and stir until combined and smooth.
Bake for 50-60 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the middle of the bread comes out clean.
Let bread rest for at least 5 minutes before slicing.
